distribution.text: Copyright 2023 SUSE LLC. All rights reserved.

notes.text:
This update for vim fixes the following security issues:

- Fixed CVE-2016-1248 an arbitrary command execution vulnerability
  (bsc#1010685)

This update for vim fixes the following issues:

- Fix build with Python 3.5. (bsc#988903)
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.text: vim before patch 8.0.0056 does not properly validate values for the 'filetype', 'syntax' and 'keymap' options, which may result in the execution of arbitrary code if a file with a specially crafted modeline is opened.
notes.title: Vulnerability description
